explains: v. 特许建立（charter 的过去分词）
wordGroup: standard chartered （英国）渣打银行；（英国）渣打集团有限公司
standard chartered bank 渣打银行
chartered accountant 注册会计师；会计师；特许会计师

sentences.en: The U.S. and Japan provisionally agreed to add new chartered flights to serve their major cities.
sentences.cn: 美国和日本临时同意增加特许航班，为各大城市服务。

sentences.en: He chartered a jet to fly her home from California to Switzerland.
sentences.cn: 他包租了一架喷气式飞机把她从加利福尼亚送回瑞士家中。

sentences.en: We've chartered the aircraft in the hopeful anticipation that the government will allow them to leave.
sentences.cn: 我们包租了那架飞机，希望政府会允许他们离开。
